name: Search_Taxi

pick_up_place_id.description: The pick up location's place id. pick_up_place_id can be retrieved from api/v1/taxi/searchLocation(Taxi Search Location) endpoint in Taxi collection as googlePlaceId.

drop_off_place_id.description: The drop off location's place id. drop_off_place_id can be retrieved from api/v1/taxi/searchLocation(Taxi Search Location) endpoint in Taxi collection as googlePlaceId.

pick_up_time.description:
Pick up time
Format: HH:MM
Note: The format of time is 24 hours.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

pick_up_place_id.description: The pick up location's place id. pick_up_place_id can be retrieved from api/v1/taxi/searchLocation(Taxi Search Location) endpoint in Taxi collection as googlePlaceId.

dropOffLocation.description: Apollo Bandar, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India
dropOffLocation.name: The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai, Apollo Bandar, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India

pickupLocation.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport (BOM), Mumbai, Maharashtra 400099, India

results.descriptionLocalised: Perfect for solo travellers, couples and small families.
Plenty of space to travel in comfort.

response_summary:
Here’s a summary of the available transportation options for your journey from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport (BOM) to The Taj Mahal Palace in Mumbai on June 15, 2025, at 14:30.  

You have three vehicle choices, all provided by E-Life Limo with a meet-and-greet service. The estimated driving distance is 29.12 km, taking approximately 51 minutes.  

1. **Standard Vehicle**: Priced at $19.58, this option is ideal for solo travelers, couples, or small families, accommodating up to 3 passengers with space for 3 bags.  

2. **People Carrier**: For $24.17, this larger vehicle can seat 4 passengers and carry 4 bags, making it a great choice for families.  

3. **Executive Vehicle**: At $27.50, this premium option offers extra comfort and space for 3 passengers and 3 bags.  

All bookings are refundable, with a cancellation window of 24 hours (1440 minutes) before the scheduled pickup time. No discounts or special offers are currently applied to these options.  

The drop-off location is The Taj Mahal Palace in Apollo Bandar, Colaba, while the pickup is at Mumbai’s international airport. None of these options support on-demand "Ride Now" availability, so advance booking is required.
enhance_func_desc: This API is suitable for booking private transportation services between specified locations. It searches available taxi options based on pickup and drop-off place IDs, date, and time. Users receive detailed vehicle choices with pricing, passenger capacity, baggage allowance, and cancellation policies. The place IDs must be obtained from the Taxi Search Location API. Ideal for travelers needing pre-booked, reliable transport with meet-and-greet services.

enhanced_parameters.pick_up_place_id: Unique identifier for the pickup location, sourced from Taxi Search Location API.
enhanced_parameters.drop_off_place_id: Unique identifier for the drop-off location, sourced from Taxi Search Location API.
enhanced_parameters.pick_up_date: Date of pickup in YYYY-MM-DD format.
enhanced_parameters.pick_up_time: Time of pickup in 24-hour HH:MM format.
enhanced_parameters.currency_code: Currency for displaying taxi service prices.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the response data.

journeys.description: List of journey details for the requested transportation options

requestedPickupDateTime.description: The scheduled date and time for pickup in ISO 8601 format

city.description: The city where the drop-off location is situated

latLng.description: Geographical coordinates of the drop-off location

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the drop-off location

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the drop-off location

description.description: A detailed description of the drop-off location

country.description: The country code of the drop-off location

isRideNowAvailable.description: Indicates if on-demand 'Ride Now' service is available at the drop-off location

name.description: The full name of the drop-off location

locationType.description: The type of the drop-off location (e.g., GEO, AIRPORT)

postcode.description: The postal code of the drop-off location

airportCode.description: The airport code if the drop-off location is an airport, otherwise null

establishment.description: The name of the establishment at the drop-off location

journeyDirection.description: The direction of the journey (e.g., OUTBOUND)
